Maven M2E Code Style plugin

  • Organizational POM
  • Coding standards
  • Commons testing
  • Java archetype
  • Other projects

m2e-codestyle:format

Full name:

net.trajano.mojo:m2e-codestyle-maven-plugin:2.0.0:format

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: process-sources.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
codeStyleBaseUrl String -

This is the URL that points to the base URL where the files are located.

The URL must end with a trailing slash as the names referenced by prefsFiles are resolved against it. If the trailing slash is missing, it will append it automatically and log a warning.

If this is not an absolute URL, it assumes that the value passed in is referring to something in the classpath.

If the value is not specified, then the default Java conventions would be used.
javaFormatterProfileXmlUrl String -

This is the URL that points to the Java formatter profile XML. The contents of this will be merged into PreferenceFileName.JDT_CORE

If this is not an absolute URL, it assumes that the value passed in is referring to something in the classpath.


User property is: codestyle.java.formatter.xml.
source String - (no description)
Default value is: 1.5.
User property is: maven.compiler.source.
target String - (no description)
Default value is: 1.5.
User property is: maven.compiler.target.

Parameter Details

codeStyleBaseUrl:

This is the URL that points to the base URL where the files are located.

The URL must end with a trailing slash as the names referenced by prefsFiles are resolved against it. If the trailing slash is missing, it will append it automatically and log a warning.

If this is not an absolute URL, it assumes that the value passed in is referring to something in the classpath.

If the value is not specified, then the default Java conventions would be used.

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

javaFormatterProfileXmlUrl:

This is the URL that points to the Java formatter profile XML. The contents of this will be merged into PreferenceFileName.JDT_CORE

If this is not an absolute URL, it assumes that the value passed in is referring to something in the classpath.

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: codestyle.java.formatter.xml

source:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven.compiler.source
  • Default: 1.5

target:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven.compiler.target
  • Default: 1.5
